docs.snippet: The Royal Mail steamship Asia, from Liverpool on the 28th of August, with three days' later news, is now fully due at Halifax. There were no signs of her at 9 o'clock last night. The Pacific, of the Galway line, arrived off Halifax harbor on Saturday...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Asia, from Liverpool on the 28th of August, with three days' later news, is now fully due at Halifax. There were no signs of her at 9 o'clock last night. The Pacific, of the Galway line, arrived off Halifax harbor on Saturday night, when she was detained by the fog, and did not reach her dock until Sunday. She left for New York at 6 o'clock last evening.

headline.main: THE STATEN ISLAND WAR.; Forthcoming Proclamation of Gov. King Present Condition of the Sick at Quarantine YELLOW-FEVER EXCITEMENT. FURTHER ARRESTS. Interesting Proceedings in Court. Suspension of Superintendent Tailmadge.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some new elements of excitement were yesterday developed at Quarantine The reception of a case of yellow-fever, on Sunday, into the hospital from the town of Ca?tleton, created considerable excitement both outside of the wall, among the villagers, and also inside among the policemen and employes.

docs.snippet: THE LAWRENCE-STREET TRAGEDY.-Mr. THEODOBE AUSTIN, who was found fatally injured on the area-way at No. 35 Lawrence street, Sunday morn ing, was still alive last evening, and talked rationally of all that transpired on Saturday, so far as he can...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE LAWRENCE-STREET TRAGEDY.-Mr. THEODOBE AUSTIN, who was found fatally injured on the area-way at No. 35 Lawrence street, Sunday morn ing, was still alive last evening, and talked rationally of all that transpired on Saturday, so far as he can remember. He was left on the stoop of the house where found at his own request.

docs.snippet: If justice were sure as it is slow, there would be some satisfaction in knowing that a half-dozen of the Quarantine rioters have been imprisoned. We should be enabled then to foresee the proper punishment of those who, regardless of life and the...
docs.lead_paragraph: If justice were sure as it is slow, there would be some satisfaction in knowing that a half-dozen of the Quarantine rioters have been imprisoned. We should be enabled then to foresee the proper punishment of those who, regardless of life and the rights of property, are guilty of the act of insurrection ;

docs.snippet: The telegraph from St. Johns, N. F., brings intelligence from Europe, received by the steamer Fulton, off Cape Race. The Fulton sailed from Southampton on the 25th ult., and was boarded by the news-yacht on Friday afternoon. Commercial matters wore a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The telegraph from St. Johns, N. F., brings intelligence from Europe, received by the steamer Fulton, off Cape Race. The Fulton sailed from Southampton on the 25th ult., and was boarded by the news-yacht on Friday afternoon. Commercial matters wore a more favorable face. The Agamemnn very nearly escaped destruction by fire.

headline.main: LATEST BY TELEGRAPH.; Central American Affairs--Mr Soule--Reconciliation of Walker and Henningsen--Mr. Benjamin as Minister to Spain--The Mission to Paraguay, &c. FROM WASHINGTON.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. SOULE is again here, and will have an interview with the President to-morrow. YRISSARI should look to his laurels, or he may find his treaty obsolete. Kind relations, I understand, have been restored between HENNINGSEN and WALKES, and the Transit arrangements are in a fair way of being concluded.

headline.main: The Opening of the Nicaragua Transit Route.

docs.lead_paragraph: The American and Pacific Ship Canal Company inaugura ed their first movement towards opening the route by an excursion down the Bay on Saturday last, on board of the steamboat Cass-Yeissari, formerly the American Eagle. About one hundred persons were on board, among whom were Senior YEISSARI, the Central American Minister.

headline.main: THE QUARANTINE ARSON.; Action of the New-York and Brooklyn Boards of Health Arrest and Admission to Rail of the Incendiaries. Movement to Protect the Shipping DESCRIPTION OF THE RUINS. AFFAIRS AT QUARANTINE YESTERDAY. PROVISION FOR THE SICK.

docs.lead_paragraph: Several of the leading Quarantine incendiaries were arrested at Tompkinsville early on Saturday morning, before they had got out of their beds, upon a warrant issued by Justice WELSH. Sergeant WATERBURT and cetectives WILDEY and STEPHANSON, with a rife corps. went out and arrested CHARLES S DE FOREST, Justice of the Peace.
